titleStmt.title: A proclamation for calling a Convention of Estates
titleStmt.author: Scotland. Sovereign (1649-1685 : Charles II)
Charles II, King of England, 1635-1685.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by the heir of Andrew Anderson, printer to His Most Sacred Majesty,

notesStmt.note: Royal arms at head of sheet; initial letter.
Dated at end: Given at Our Court at Whitehall, the twenty-third day of May, 1678, and of Our Reign the thirtieth year.
Reproduction of the original in the National Library of Scotland.
